channel.title: CVE Feed for NVIDIA -- NVIDIA DGX servers
channel.description: The latest CVEs for NVIDIA -- NVIDIA DGX servers

item.title: CVE-2022-42279|2024-08-03T13:03:45.981Z -- nvidia -- nvidia%20dgx%20servers
item.description: NVIDIA BMC contains a vulnerability in SPX REST API, where an authorized attacker can inject arbitrary shell commands, which may lead to code execution, denial of service, information disclosure and data tampering.

item.title: CVE-2022-42281|2024-08-03T13:03:45.910Z -- nvidia -- nvidia%20dgx%20servers
item.description: NVIDIA DGX A100 contains a vulnerability in SBIOS in the FsRecovery, which may allow a highly privileged local attacker to cause an out-of-bounds write, which may lead to code execution, denial of service, compromised integrity, and information disclosure.

item.title: CVE-2022-42282|2024-08-03T13:03:45.936Z -- nvidia -- nvidia%20dgx%20servers
item.description: NVIDIA BMC contains a vulnerability in SPX REST API, where an authorized attacker can access arbitrary files, which may lead to information disclosure.

item.title: CVE-2022-42286|2024-08-03T13:03:46.019Z -- nvidia -- nvidia%20dgx%20servers
item.description: DGX A100 SBIOS contains a vulnerability in Bds, which may lead to code execution, denial of service, or escalation of privileges.

item.title: CVE-2022-42280|2024-08-03T13:03:45.915Z -- nvidia -- nvidia%20dgx%20servers
item.description: NVIDIA BMC contains a vulnerability in SPX REST auth handler, where an un-authorized attacker can exploit a path traversal, which may lead to authentication bypass.

item.title: CVE-2022-42272|2024-08-03T13:03:45.793Z -- nvidia -- nvidia%20dgx%20servers
item.description: NVIDIA BMC contains a vulnerability in IPMI handler, where an authorized attacker can cause a buffer overflow, which may lead to code execution, denial of service or escalation of privileges.

item.title: CVE-2022-42276|2024-08-03T13:03:45.885Z -- nvidia -- nvidia%20dgx%20servers
item.description: NVIDIA DGX A100 contains a vulnerability in SBIOS in the SmiFlash, where a local user with elevated privileges can read, write and erase flash, which may lead to code execution, escalation of privileges, denial of service, and information disclosure. The scope of impact can extend to other components.

item.title: CVE-2022-42285|2024-08-03T13:03:45.897Z -- nvidia -- nvidia%20dgx%20servers
item.description: DGX A100 SBIOS contains a vulnerability in the Pre-EFI Initialization (PEI)phase, where a privileged user can disable SPI flash protection, which may lead to denial of service, escalation of privileges, or data tampering.

item.title: CVE-2022-42287|2024-08-03T13:03:45.911Z -- nvidia -- nvidia%20dgx%20servers
item.description: NVIDIA BMC contains a vulnerability in IPMI handler, where an authorized attacker can upload and download arbitrary files under certain circumstances, which may lead to denial of service, escalation of privileges, information disclosure and data tampering.

item.title: CVE-2022-42277|2024-08-03T13:03:45.916Z -- nvidia -- nvidia%20dgx%20servers
item.description: NVIDIA DGX Station contains a vulnerability in SBIOS in the SmiFlash, where a local user with elevated privileges can read, write and erase flash, which may lead to code execution, escalation of privileges, denial of service, and information disclosure. The scope of impact can extend to other components.

item.title: CVE-2022-42274|2024-08-03T13:03:45.821Z -- nvidia -- nvidia%20dgx%20servers
item.description: NVIDIA BMC contains a vulnerability in IPMI handler, where an authorized attacker can cause a buffer overflow and cause a denial of service or gain code execution.

item.title: CVE-2022-42273|2024-08-03T13:03:45.916Z -- nvidia -- nvidia%20dgx%20servers
item.description: NVIDIA BMC contains a vulnerability in libwebsocket, where an authorized attacker can cause a buffer overflow and cause a denial of service or gain code execution.

item.title: CVE-2022-42278|2024-08-03T13:03:45.916Z -- nvidia -- nvidia%20dgx%20servers
item.description: NVIDIA BMC contains a vulnerability in SPX REST API, where an authorized attacker can read and write to arbitrary locations within the memory context of the IPMI server process, which may lead to code execution, denial of service, information disclosure and data tampering.

item.title: CVE-2022-42289|2024-08-03T13:03:45.915Z -- nvidia -- nvidia%20dgx%20servers
item.description: NVIDIA BMC contains a vulnerability in SPX REST API, where an authorized attacker can inject arbitrary shell commands, which may lead to code execution, denial of service, information disclosure and data tampering.

item.title: CVE-2022-42288|2024-08-03T13:03:45.977Z -- nvidia -- nvidia%20dgx%20servers
item.description: NVIDIA BMC contains a vulnerability in IPMI handler, where an unauthorized attacker can use certain oracles to guess a valid BMC username, which may lead to an information disclosure.

item.title: CVE-2022-42283|2024-08-03T13:03:45.971Z -- nvidia -- nvidia%20dgx%20servers
item.description: NVIDIA BMC contains a vulnerability in IPMI handler, where an authorized attacker can cause a buffer overflow and cause a denial of service or gain code execution.

item.title: CVE-2022-42275|2024-08-03T13:03:45.780Z -- nvidia -- nvidia%20dgx%20servers
item.description: NVIDIA BMC IPMI handler allows an unauthenticated host to write to a host SPI flash bypassing secureboot protections. This may lead to a loss of integrity and denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2022-42290|2024-08-03T13:03:45.919Z -- nvidia -- nvidia%20dgx%20servers
item.description: NVIDIA BMC contains a vulnerability in SPX REST API, where an authorized attacker can inject arbitrary shell commands, which may lead to code execution, denial of service, information disclosure and data tampering.

item.title: CVE-2022-42271|2024-08-03T13:03:45.777Z -- nvidia -- nvidia%20dgx%20servers
item.description: NVIDIA BMC contains a vulnerability in IPMI handler, where an authorized attacker can cause a buffer overflow and cause a denial of service or gain code execution

item.title: CVE-2022-42284|2024-08-03T13:03:45.918Z -- nvidia -- nvidia%20dgx%20servers
item.description: NVIDIA BMC stores user passwords in an obfuscated form in a database accessible by the host. This may lead to a credentials exposure.
